name: Fitness Witness
alt: Screenshot of Fitness app with charts on workout data.
description: provides a way to keep track of workouts and progress.

name: 24/7 Budget Buddy
alt: Screenshot of Budget Buddy app showing current cash on hand with total trend.
description: gives you the option to track you incoming and outgoing expenses whether you are online or offline.

name: Burger Log
alt: Screenshot of Burger log site displaying a panel for already eaten burgers and burgers on the to-eat list.
description: gives you a place to keep track of burgers you have eaten or would like to eat.

name: Dogtionary
alt: Screenshot of Dogtionary site displaying a black lab available for adoption.
description: helps you find dogs in your area in need of a home and displays information about a breed for your consideration.

name: Harry Potter Quiz
alt: Screenshot of Harry Potter quiz question.
description: tests your knowledge of the wizarding world with a timed and scored series of questions.

name: Weather Dashboard
alt: Screenshot of dashboard displaying today's weather for New York, and the weather for the next 5 days.
description: helps you prepare for today and the next 5 days.
